document_data.name: The Shattered Throne Tumbles
document_data.author: [[Annadas Athlo]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Shattered Throne Tumbles''''' was a type of stage performance called "grand play", popularized in [[Athkatla]] of [[Amn]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: ''The Shattered Throne Tumbles'' was penned before the late 14{{th}} century DR by a blind [[monk]] of the [[Ilmatari]] faith. The "grand play" was regularly performed at the famous [[The Crown Aflame]] theater in Athkatla's [[Athkatla/Temple District|Temple District]].
